Trump's MAGA supporters split over his foreign policy
subhead: The US president has consistently presented himself as the champion of 'America First,' placing national interests at the heart of his agenda. But his wavering over Ukraine, unconditional support for Israel and, above all, strikes against Iran have shaken his MAGA base.

title: At Gaza's border, influencers broadcast Israeli propaganda
subhead: In an effort to discredit the United Nations's recognition of a state of famine in the enclave, the Israeli army has organized visits to a humanitarian aid platform near the Kerem Shalom crossing point.

title: Mohammed VI, Islam and the Islamists
subhead: 'The Enigma of Mohammed VI' (6/6). His status as 'commander of the faithful' has given the Moroccan king a unique aura and has enabled him to push back against the ambitions of Islamists, whose political project and way of life he rejects.

The twilight of Morocco's King Mohammed VI
subhead: 'The Enigma of Mohammed VI' (1/6). Twenty-six years after his 1999 coronation, the Moroccan monarch's relationship to power remains complex. As questions about his health arise, the prospect of his succession is fueling power struggles and backroom deals among the country's elite.

title: Life in the West Bank settlement of Kedem Arava: 'We're not taking anyone's place, there is only sand around us'
subhead: Established in 2017 near the Jordanian border, the Kedem Arava settlement contains prefabricated homes housing some 60 families, former city dwellers seeking a life closer to nature. While most residents deny ideological motivation, their presence fully aligns with the annexation of Palestinian territory sought by the Israeli far right.

title: Read Macron's full letter to Netanyahu
